system.Text:
When __you attempt something risky or react to an imminent threat__, envision your action and roll. If you act...

  * With speed, agility, or precision: Roll +edge.
  * With charm, loyalty, or courage: Roll +heart.
  * With aggressive action, forceful defense, strength, or endurance: Roll +iron.
  * With deception, stealth, or trickery: Roll +shadow.
  * With expertise, insight, or observation: Roll +wits.

On a __strong hit__, you are successful. Take +1 momentum.

On a __weak hit__, you succeed, but face a troublesome cost. Choose one.

  * You are delayed, lose advantage, or face a new danger: Suffer -1 momentum.
  * You are tired or hurt: @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.fdb51ee928b4fca2]{Endure Harm} (1 harm).
  * You are dispirited or afraid: @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.e09e2fc8bb709320]{Endure Stress} (1 stress).
  * You sacrifice resources: Suffer -1 supply.

On a __miss__, you fail, or your progress is undermined by a dramatic and costly turn of events. @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.c10d64f58dd8c5bf]{Pay the Price}.
